item.title: Why Does It Feel Like Floaters Are Ruining My Life?
item.description:
If you found this post by typing “why does it feel like floaters are ruining my life” — stop for a second.

Breathe.

You’re not crazy.
You’re not weak.
And you’re absolutely not alone.

I know what this feels like. Like something small has hijacked everything. Like your world shrank overnight. Like you’re never going to feel normal again.

But that’s not the end of the story.

Why Floaters Trigger Such a Deep Emotional Reaction

Floaters are tiny specks in your eye — but they attack something much deeper:
Your sense of control. Your focus. Your peace.
